definition: to touch/to make contact with sth/to stir up sb's emotions
to feel with the hand/to touch/to stroke/to grope/to steal/to abstract
to get rid of/to put aside/to reject/to keep control/to hold (one's breath)

sentences.english: Touchscreens are generally considered the next step in HIDD human driven interfaces.
sentences.chinese: 觸摸屏一般被認爲是下一步HIDD人力驅動接口。

sentences.english: For her part, she insists touch-screens will soon be owned by everyone.
sentences.chinese: 對於她來說，她堅信觸摸屏會很快普及。

sentences.english: PLC control, human-computer touch-screen, practical function and easy operation.
sentences.chinese: PLC控制，人機畫面觸摸屏，功能實用，操作簡便。

sentences.english: The touch screen is a five-incher and can be used for navigation and display.
sentences.chinese: 5英寸的觸摸屏，用做導航和顯示。

sentences.english: Function "Snooze" by simple detection of movement of the device or by touching the screen.
sentences.chinese: 功能“貪睡”，由這些簡單的檢測設備移動或觸摸屏。

sentences.english: They now have cameras, full Web browsers, qwerty keyboards and touch-screens.
sentences.chinese: 如今，黑莓的手機擁有全鍵盤攝像頭以及觸摸屏。

sentences.english: Operating experience is obviously improved by the capacitive touch screen with two-point induction.
sentences.chinese: 運行經驗有明顯提高的有兩個點感應電容式觸摸屏。

sentences.english: There's an electronic touch screen in it which introduces the development of Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 那邊有個電子觸摸屏，裏面介紹釋教的發展。

sentences.english: There are both traditional BlackBerrys with a small keyboard and touch-screen BlackBerrys.
sentences.chinese: 黑莓手機分成傳全鍵盤和觸摸屏兩種。

sentences.english: It is also the only domestic manufacturer analog resistive touch-screen business.
sentences.chinese: 同時也是國內唯一一家生產電阻式模擬觸摸屏的企業。

sentences.english: They have a small touch-screen display and audio speaker, for user interaction.
sentences.chinese: 此外還有用於用戶互動的觸摸屏和對講器。

sentences.english: They are part of the touchpad bezel and are made of some rubber-like material, too.
sentences.chinese: 他們屬於觸摸屏面板，並作了一些橡膠狀物質，太。

sentences.english: The touch-screen surface eliminates pushbutton cavities which prevents liquid ingress.
sentences.chinese: 觸摸屏表面沒有按鈕腔，這就避免了液體的進入。

sentences.english: PLC programmed controller, 7' color touch screen, man-machine interface.
sentences.chinese: 採用PLC可編程控制器，7英寸彩色液晶觸摸屏。

sentences.english: It can also be operated using touchscreen and cruise-control functions.
sentences.chinese: 也可以用觸摸屏操作和巡航功能進行控制。

sentences.english: The only difference now is the screen size and the use of touch input.
sentences.chinese: 現在唯一的區別就是屏幕大小和使用觸摸屏輸入。
